imdb.plot outline: Popular artist Geoff Kersey covers subjects such as what to buy, how to mix colours, how to use masking fluid and demonstrates both wet into wet and dry brush work. Geoff demonstrates how to paint skies, trees, water, buildings, coastal scenes and so much more.
imdb.title: Geoff's Top Tips for Watercolour Artists
akas: Geoff's Top Tips for Watercolour Artists (United Kingdom)
plot: Popular artist Geoff Kersey covers subjects such as what to buy, how to mix colours, how to use masking fluid and demonstrates both wet into wet and dry brush work. Geoff demonstrates how to paint skies, trees, water, buildings, coastal scenes and so much more.
